item.title: What the trump slump means for Your Money
item.author: THE TIMES
item.description:
Ali Hussain
I
Investors are taking steps to protect their portfolios following market shocks caused by America's new trade tariffs - but some are looking to profit from the dips.
While Britain was let off relatively lightly with a 10 per cent tariff on goods exported to America (compared with 20 ...
